thread.title: New App Updates Show Up on Windows 10
thread.title_full: New App Updates Show Up on Windows 10 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: New App Updates Show Up on Windows 10
text: Microsoft has released new app updates for Windows 10 today, so consumers who have already installed the new operating system are recommended to fire up the store and look in the Downloads and updates section to get the new versions as soon as possible. There are two updates waiting for your download now, namely Get Office and Photos, but just as usual, there are no release notes, so it’s hard to tell what exactly has changed in these versions.
